title: Fix background color when panning schematic
description: Enhances the user experience by ensuring the schematic viewer's background color matches the SVG background during panning.

title: support nine point anchor alignment for silkscreen texts
description: Enhancements to text alignment functionality for silkscreen texts improve usability and flexibility in PCB design.

title: chore: update dependency
description: Updating dependencies ensures the project remains up-to-date with the latest features and fixes, contributing to overall stability and performance.

title: refactored pcb_silkscreen_rect properties
description: Refactoring of properties enhances clarity and usability for defining PCB silkscreen rectangles.

title: filled boolean prop to pcb_silkscreen_rect
description: Adding a filled boolean property enhances the flexibility of the PCB silkscreen rectangle definition, allowing for more detailed design specifications.

title: feat: add support for simple_fuse component with ratings and schematic display
description: Introducing a new component for simple fuses enhances the library's capability to model electrical circuits more accurately.

title: Add subtree filtering util
description: Enhancements to subtree filtering capabilities significantly improve the utility's functionality for managing circuit elements.

title: filled and stroke as props for silkscreen rects
description: Enhancements to silkscreen rectangle properties improve customization for keyboard design.

title: enable disabling pcb/schematic/parts engine inside platform config
description: Enhancements to platform configuration allow for greater flexibility in enabling or disabling specific engines.

title: add match-adapt layout method
description: Enhancement of layout configuration by introducing a new 'match-adapt' mode, improving flexibility in layout options.

title: require either width & height or overlay
description: Enhancements to the SchematicBoxProps validation ensure that either both width and height are provided or a non-empty overlay array, improving component robustness.

title: Add tscircuit platform configuration docs
description: Enhancements to documentation for platform configuration improve usability and understanding for developers.

title: improved schematicBox props
description: Enhancements to the schematicBox properties provide greater flexibility and customization options for users.

title: added paddingTop , Bottom , Right , Left
description: Enhancements to padding properties improve layout flexibility for schematic boxes.

title: extend footprint library map with support for async footprints, add localCacheEngine
description: Enhancements to the footprint library map and the introduction of a local cache engine improve the flexibility and performance of the platform configuration.

title: Add footprintLibraryMap to platformConfig
description: Enhancing the platform configuration with a new optional mapping feature adds flexibility for future developments.

title: Add connector component
description: The addition of a new `<connector />` component enhances the library's functionality for building keyboards, aligning with the project's goals.

title: add schPinArrangement prop for PinHeaders
description: Enhancement of the PinHeader component by introducing a new property for schematic pin arrangement, improving its configurability.

title: fixed pinlabelverticallyinverted pinrow property
description: Enhancements to pin label alignment logic improve the usability of the keyboard building tools.

title: fixed pinrow pinlabel orientation options
description: Enhancements to pinlabel orientation options improve flexibility in design configurations.

title: refactor pinrow
description: Enhancements to the pinrow functionality improve flexibility in pin label positioning and alignment.

title: Remove the normalize function and import it from core
description: Refactoring to enhance code maintainability by centralizing the normalize function.

title: add missing parts
description: Enhancements to the library by adding missing components and tests for better functionality.

title: add missing part C9900017879
description: Enhancements to the EasyEDA converter by adding support for a new component, improving functionality and usability.

title: updated jscad-electronics fixing tssop and soic
description: Enhancements to the jscad-electronics library improve component footprint handling, contributing to better circuit design capabilities.

title: support nine point anchor alignment for silkscreen texts
description: Enhancements to silkscreen text alignment improve usability for PCB design.

title: feat: pinrow pinlabel text alignment options
description: Enhancements to pinrow text alignment options improve usability and flexibility in circuit design.

title: Add footprint URL support
description: Enhancing the rendering process by enabling footprint loading from URLs significantly improves flexibility and usability.

title: updated deps + updated ss + fixed square pad plated hole for pinrow
description: Enhancements to component creation logic and dependency updates improve functionality and maintainability.

title: fix: timeout issue for `compile`
description: Addresses a timeout issue by ensuring that a 'Not found' response is handled gracefully, improving reliability.

title: feat: add Fuse component support
description: The addition of the Fuse component enhances the library's functionality for building electrical circuits, aligning with the goal of creating comprehensive tools for keyboard building.

title: feat(refactor):add support simple_led
description: Enhancements to LED component functionality by adding support for simple LED specifications.

title: export normalizePinLabels function
description: Enhancing the utility of the library by exporting a new function for pin label normalization.

title: Add support for pin order in PinHeader
description: Enhancements to the PinHeader component improve its configurability for schematic designs.

title: Add parts engine caching
description: Enhancements to the parts engine with local caching improve performance and efficiency in component queries.

title: add support for jumpers with custom pins as string union (function selectors)
description: Enhancements to jumper support with custom pin functionality improve flexibility in keyboard building.

title: Update jumper schematic defaults
description: Enhancements to the jumper component improve schematic rendering, aligning with keyboard building tools.

title: Add SHLD net selector
description: Enhancement of the selector functionality by introducing the SHLD net, improving the flexibility of the library.

title: Refactor PR analysis structure and enhance discussion comment classification criteria for improved clarity and strictness.
description: Refactoring the analysis structure and enhancing classification criteria improves clarity and strictness in evaluating contributions.

title: update schematic-symbols dependencies
description: Updating the schematic-symbols dependency enhances the project's compatibility and potentially improves functionality.

title: Add board aspect ratio option for PCB SVG
description: Enhancing the SVG generation process by allowing aspect ratio adjustments based on PCB board dimensions adds significant value to the usability of the tool.

title: Add PCB rendering context, support `{ layer: "top" | "bottom" }` options, major refactor for context passing pattern
description: Enhancements to PCB rendering with improved context management and layer support significantly streamline the rendering process.

title: fixed silkscreen text from getting blurry in big boards
description: Enhancing the clarity of silkscreen text on larger boards significantly improves the visual quality and usability of the PCB designs.

title: VCC symbol
description: The addition of the VCC symbol enhances the library's functionality for keyboard building.

description: Enhancements to link presentation and accessibility improve user experience and interface clarity.

description: Enhancing user interaction by updating the decoration class to include a cursor pointer improves the overall usability of the CodeEditor component.

title: update circuit-to-svg and schematic-symbols dependencies
description: Updating dependencies enhances the stability and performance of the project, ensuring compatibility with the latest features and fixes.

title: refactor(landing): enhance button responsiveness and layout for better mobile experience
description: Enhancing button responsiveness and layout significantly improves the mobile user experience on the landing page.

title: feat: restrict access to private packages based on user session
description: Enhancing security by restricting access to private packages based on user session validation.

title: feat(editor)!!: fully refactored package based editor for dx and new features
description: Significantly enhances the editor's functionality by introducing a fully refactored package-based system with file management features, including file deletion and improved state management.

title: update some important dependencies
description: Updating dependencies enhances the stability and security of the project, ensuring compatibility with the latest features and fixes.

title: fake: add support to get the account by github_username
description: Enhances account retrieval functionality by allowing access via GitHub usernames, improving user experience.

title: Change "Open Online Example" to link to USBC Flashlight
description: The change enhances user navigation by linking the Online Example button to a relevant resource, improving the overall user experience.

title: Inject package content into page prior to initial render
description: Enhances server-side rendering by injecting package data into the HTML before the initial render, improving performance and user experience.

title: feat(refactor): apply consistent capitalization to user-facing strings
description: Enhancing user interface consistency through capitalization adjustments improves readability and user experience.

title: Fallback route when the category doesn't matches of the parts
description: Introduces a fallback route for handling unmatched categories, enhancing error handling and user experience.

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.430
description: Updating the core library version enhances compatibility and may introduce new features or fixes.

title: update dependencies
description: Updating dependencies enhances the stability and performance of the project, ensuring compatibility with the latest features and fixes.

title: fix: Prevent execution hang when stopping and rerunning circuit compilation
description: Enhancements to prevent execution hangs during circuit compilation, improving user experience and resource management.

title: Replace iframe with YouTubeEmbed component for video links in docs
description: Enhancing documentation by replacing iframe elements with a dedicated YouTubeEmbed component improves maintainability and consistency.

title: add important workflows
description: Enhancements to CI/CD workflows significantly improve the development process.

title: add docs supporting importing JLCPCB components using RunFrame
description: Enhances documentation by providing clear instructions and a video tutorial for importing JLCPCB components, improving user experience.

title: Consumable Improvements - Add output CircuitLayoutJson for usage with tscircuit/core
description: Enhancements to the circuit layout output format significantly improve integration with the core library.

title: pathTo pathfinding, major fixes for adaptation, pinMargin for adaptation, FD graph fixes, many fixes for issues and scoring
description: Significant enhancements to adaptation capabilities, including pathfinding and pin margin support, which are crucial for improving circuit design accuracy.

title: template8
description: Introduces a new template for circuit design, enhancing the library's functionality.

title: Template7 and force directed netlist visualization
description: Enhances the schematic-match-adapt project by introducing a new template and a force-directed graph visualization for netlists, improving usability and functionality.

title: New template6, fix adaptations changing perfect matching boxes, make `remove_chip` adaptation remove all connected lines
description: Enhancements to template handling and adaptation logic improve the overall functionality of the schematic matching process.

title: Break up adaptation into multiple solvers, show output Circuit Json SVG, fix applying layout to circuit json to include proper net labels
description: Enhancements to the adaptation process and visualization of circuit layouts significantly improve the functionality and usability of the tool.

title: Initial STL Support
description: Adding STL support enhances the library's capabilities for 3D rendering, making it more versatile for users.

title: Add support for box top images
description: Enhancing the rendering capabilities by adding support for perspective-correct top face images significantly improves the visual fidelity of 3D SVG boxes.

title: Add top face image support
description: Enhancing the rendering capabilities by adding support for top face images significantly improves the visual representation of 3D boxes.
